channel.title: Fed Up With Stupid Webclients Need Help Now!
channel.description:
Ok im fucking fed up now ive tried for 2 days straight hours and hours trying to get a poxy webclient to work and it doesnt!
Ive signed it all and done, the client work when i open up client.jar so ive done it right!
but when I put it on html and then on the internet it doesnt loads i get many different errors at deifferent times
1. cannot find client.class (bullshit) 2. Connection error (also bullshit)
Its mucked up.
As well as that no one helps you or replies of these forums its pointless.

item.title: Fed Up With Stupid Webclients Need Help Now!
item.dc:creator: @Zincy Zincy
item.description:
@Zincy wrote:

ive tried it but il give it another go

thanks for replying seems like your the only guy who accurlly helps the community

EDIT -

ive tried and it still dont work

basiclly

i load up the client and it says download cache… then says client updated please restart client.

I restart client it says downloading cache and then connection error. re-trying in 5…

I open up the client.jar i made and it downloads cache fine and then works fine, its just getting it online…

Read full topic
item.source: Fed Up With Stupid Webclients Need Help Now!

try to re-upload the client.jar?
